name: Lone Wolf Wingman: One Shot Alliance
name_original: Lone Wolf Wingman: One Shot Alliance
description:
Game Info:

In this slow and steady airplane game, your mission is to take control of enemy missile silos by attacking them. As you fly your aircraft through enemy airspace, you must take aim at the silos that are scatteres over the landscape.

With just one shot, you can turn the tide of the battle and secure a crucial victory for your team. But be careful - the enemy won't make it easy for you. They will try to take them back, and you'll need quick reflexes and precise aim to succeed. Will you be able to claim victory and save the day?

Gameplay:
  • Shoot the Missile Silos
  • Don't collide with your own Silos
  • Convert them all to win
Controls:

W and Up Arrow = Throttle
A, D and Left, Right Arrows = Steer Left / Right
Space = Fire your weapon
Escape = Pause

Info:
  • Made for Wonderjam 4
  • All assets made for the jam
  • Music By Bonamici (Bonamici Soundcloud)
